Line1.BAE4.Dru: Creatures run free inside. No one to hinder them.
Line1.BAE4.Nec: A house of the Zakarum...left alone to rot?
Line1.BAE4.Rog: No monks, no wards...why do I feel I am being watched?
Line1.BAE4.Sor: This place has been taken. It reeks of forbidden spells.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Bar: To self. Wary. Something is wrong here.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Dru: To self. Wary. Something is wrong here.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Nec: To self. Mild contempt for Zakarum. Wary.
VoiceDir1.BAE4.Rog: To self. Wary. Something is wrong here.
